content:
Mariyaamine nyaan veshyasamam-vediyu-musha-ssil
Evam yausepporu sandhyaa-neram chintichu
/tnidrayilannaall-vaanavaseneshan
/tvannu vachichaan;-daaveedaathmajane!
Sandeham nee mariyaamil-kaikkondeedendaa
Roohaa moolam garbhiniyaay-ttheernnaall lokatthe
/thaaleluyyaa-paalicheedumavan.

Yauseppathyantam chintaa-vyaakulanaayu thalppe mevi
Kanyaadooshyam chonnoril-ninnum nindaye neekkaanaayu
Goodham mariyaamine viduvaan-gaadham paryaalochikke
Thaathan vittaan dootheshan-gabriyeline meleennum.
Roohaayaalathre mariyaam-garbham poondennum puthran
Daivaathmajanennum svapne-doothan yauseppinu kaatti
Nidrayil ninnumunarnnudane-dhanyathayerum kanyakaye
Sambhramapoorvvam vandich-bhaashichaanathyuchatthil
Shuddhimathee! Ninneyum nin-aathmajaneyum kooppunnen
Jaathikalle nalvazhiyettaan-thanne ayachon dhanyan thaan.

Daaveedin makall-mariyaamin
Muravilli sehiyo-nil ketten
/tpurushan sparshichillenne
/tnyaan veshyaasthree-yennu janam
Naathhaa! Kaakkuka nir-ddoshiniye.
